p.k: 8 – 11 year olds: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream – all of these can be used to create masterpieces of children’s art.
p.d: Making crafts with your child is a piece of cake! We will make a beautiful picture out of plasticine and thread. We’ll make these two trees: a willow tree and a birch tree.
